study_information.title: Western Ghats Land Use Land Cover Analysis using Dynamic World
study_information.data_source: Google Earth Engine Dynamic World V1
study_information.methodology: Refined approach using probability bands with quality filtering

data_quality.quality_assessment: Excellent - no impossible land cover classes detected
data_quality.methodology_validation: Refined approach eliminated previous data quality issues

methodology_improvements.previous_issues: Impossible snow/ice detection, unrealistic growth rates
methodology_improvements.refined_approach: Probability bands with quality filtering and geographic constraints
methodology_improvements.validation_method: Test area validation before full analysis
methodology_improvements.quality_controls: Eliminated impossible classes, realistic growth patterns
